title: Repeat Performance (restored, colorized) (1947, crime, imdb score: 6.8)

sources.title: Repeat Performance (restored, colorized) (1947, crime, imdb score: 6.8)
sources.description: Repeat Performance is a 1947 American film noir (with fantasy elements) starring Louis Hayward and Joan Leslie . The film was released by Eagle-Lion Films , directed by Alfred L. Werker , and produced by Aubrey Schenck .
